content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Maryam, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Duisburg. Let's focus on discussing the rental price for now. To start the negotiation, I have an initial price in mind, but I'm open to hearing your proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your honesty. I am a student and I am looking for the lowest price possible. I am willing to offer 400 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to secure the highest price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I will make a counteroffer of 500 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While appreciating your interest, I still believe the apartment deserves a higher price. However, let's consider this counteroffer of 500 Euros for now.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, and I respect that. I will make a final offer of 450 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial target price has not been met with this offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Thank you for your time, Maryam.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
